verses.text: ME‘A mai ‘eni, ‘a ha‘a koloa‘ia, fei mo tangi, ‘o ‘oiauē fakapō ‘i ho‘omou ngaahi mamahi ‘oku tu‘unuku mai.
Kuo popo ho‘omou koloa, pea kuo anea ho‘omou ngaahi kofu.
Kuo ‘osi ‘ume‘umea ho‘omou koula mo e siliva; ‘io, ko hono ‘ume‘umea te ne talatalaaki‘i kimoutolu, pea te ne keina homou kakano ‘o hangē ko e afi. Kuo mou fa‘oaki koloa ‘i he kapa ‘o e kuonga.

Ko ena ‘a e totongi ‘o e kau ngāue na‘e utu homou ta‘u, ‘a ia kuo ta‘ofi meiate kinautolu: ‘oku kaila ia meiate kimoutolu; kae‘uma‘ā ko e tangi ‘a e kau tu‘usi kuo tau atu ki he fofonga ‘o e ‘Eiki Sāpaoti.
Kuo mou mo‘ui fakahāuē ‘i māmani, mo fakausousa; kuo mou fangapesi homou loto ‘i he ‘aho tāmate‘i.
Kuo mou fakahalaia, kuo mou fakapoongi ‘a e angatonu; tala‘ehai ‘oku ne talitu‘u kiate kimoutolu.

Ko ia, kāinga, mou kātaki pē ‘o a‘u ki he hoko mai ‘a e ‘Eiki. Vakai, ‘oku nofo‘aki tali ‘a e fa‘a ki he fua mahu‘inga ‘o e kelekele; pea ‘oku ne kātaki hono tauhi, kae‘oua ke tō ki ai ‘a e ‘uha mu‘a mo e ‘uha mui.
Ke mou kātaki mo kimoutolu; poupou homou loto: he kuo ofi ‘a e hoko mai ‘a e ‘Eiki.
Kāinga, ‘oua te mou felāunga‘aki, na‘a fakamaau? kimoutolu: ko ena ‘a e fakamaau ‘oku tu‘u ‘i he matapā.
Si‘oku kāinga, kapau ‘oku mou fiema‘u ha fa‘ifa‘itaki‘anga ‘o e mamahi mo e kātaki, ko e kau Palōfita ‘ena, ‘a ia na‘a nau lea ‘i he huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki.
Vakai, ‘oku mau lau ko e monū‘ia ‘a kinautolu kuo kātaki, Kuo mou fanongo ki he kātaki ‘a Siope; mou vakai foki hono iku‘anga mei he ‘Eiki: tā ‘oku ‘ofa u‘uu‘u ‘a e ‘Eiki, mo ‘ofangofua.

Ka sinoeme‘a, si‘oku kāinga, ‘oua te mou lea tuki; pe ki he langi, pe ki he fonua, pe ki ha me‘a ‘e taha: ka ke ‘Io pē ho‘omou ‘io, mo ‘Ikai pē ho‘omou ‘ikai; koe‘uhi ke ‘oua te mou mo‘ua ‘i he fakamaau.
‘Oku ngaohikovia koā hamou taha? Ke ne lotu pē. ‘Oku loto fiefia ha taha? Ke ne fai ha hiva.
‘Oku ‘i ai hamou taha ‘oku mahaki? Ke ne ui ange ‘a e kau mātu‘a ‘o e siasi; pea te nau lotua ia, ‘o tākai ‘aki ‘a e lolo ‘i he huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki.
Pea ko e lotu ‘a tui te ne fakamo‘ui ‘a e mahaki, pea ‘e fokotu‘u ia ‘e he ‘Eiki; pea neongo kuo ne fai ha angahala, ka ‘e fakamolemole ia.
Ko ia, mou fevete‘aki ho‘omou ngaahi angahala, pea fehūfia‘aki; koe‘uhi ke mou mo‘ui. Ko e lotu fakamātoato ‘a e tangata mā‘oni‘oni ‘oku ‘aonga lahi.
Ko ‘Ilaisiā ko e tangata alāanga mo kitautolu, pea ne mātu‘aki lotu ke ‘oua na‘a ‘uha: pea na‘e ‘ikai tō ha ‘uha ki he fonua, ‘o ‘osi ha ta‘u ‘e tolu mo e māhina ‘e ono.
Pea ne toe fai ‘ene lotu, pea na‘e tuku hifo ‘e he langi ha ‘uha, pea tupu mei he kelekele hono fua.
Si‘oku kāinga, kapau ‘e taki hē hamou toko taha mei he mo‘oni, pea fakafoki mai ia ‘e ha taha;
ke mou ‘ilo pē, ko ia kuo ne fakafoki mai ha angahala mei he‘ene ‘alu hē, ko ‘ene fakahaofi ha laumālie mei he mate, mo ne ‘ufi‘ufi ha fu‘ufu‘unga angahala.
